summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackButtah AHA/BHA Rosewater Toner is an innovative multi-function toner-exfoliator that gently cleans, refreshes and balances skin for a radiant, petal-soft complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsInnovative multi-function toner-exfoliator that gently cleans, refreshes and balances skin for a radiant, petal-soft complexionThe soothing scent of Damascus Rose and Lavender linger beautifullyFeaturesAlpha and Beta Hydroxy Salicylic Acids balance excess oil and unclog pores for fresh, youthful, healthy-looking skinLavender Essential Oil, soothes with skin-calming properties and helps reduce stress with its natural therapeutic scentItem 2585284How To UseSoak a cotton pad with Buttah Rosewater Toner and gently pat it over your face, neck, and chest. Use toner after washing your face, and before using Buttah Vitamin C Serum and moisturizer. You can also skip the cotton pad and put a few drops of toner into the palms of your hands and then delicately press them into your face.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 20, Propanediol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Cocamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Salicylic Acid, Lavandula Oil/ Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Edulis Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract, Alcohol Denat., Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Bisulfite, Linalyl Acetate, Linalool.
how_to_use: Soak a cotton pad with Buttah Rosewater Toner and gently pat it over your face, neck, and chest. Use toner after washing your face, and before using Buttah Vitamin C Serum and moisturizer. You can also skip the cotton pad and put a few drops of toner into the palms of your hands and then delicately press them into your face.

reviews.headline: Cleared my nose!
reviews.comments: Loved how it clear my nose and chin from black heads/clogged pores. I need to re buy!

reviews.headline: I see a difference in my skin.
reviews.comments: I love this product! My skin looks clearer and my dark spots are fading. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love this toner!
reviews.comments: Was introduce to this line over 6 months ago and absolutely love several of their products.  The toner is light and removes any impurities.  Leave your skin feeling fresh,

reviews.headline: I would would DEFINITELY buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I LOVE how the Rosewater Toner makes my skin feel fresh and clean.

reviews.headline: Effective but harsh
reviews.comments: This product is effective, but it's too harsh for me to use daily. I don't have sensitive skin and can only use this product once a week. If I use it more than once a week, it will dry my face, severally.

reviews.headline: Smells too Strong
reviews.comments: This works fine I suppose, but the smell is very strong and I am on the sensitive side.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: Bought this toner based on the reviews it received.  This toner is super strong and completed burned my skin after two uses.

reviews.headline: Best toner I've ever used
reviews.comments: Since i started using this toner my pores look smaller, my skin is softer, and my makeup and sunscreen sit on my face better. My sunscreen and makeuk used to pill up on parts if my face and my face would get oily after just an hour or so. Ive used up my first bottle and realized after the first week of using my makeup doesn't pill up, my t-zone doesnt get flaky, and my face isn't oily all day long. I just wish they sold a larger size bottle. It's still a great investment!

reviews.headline: Skin Care made easy for me
reviews.comments: The product works and that is important if it doesn't work then it's a bust

reviews.headline: love this product
reviews.comments: I love this product. I'm a 34yo female with combo skin and just recently developed adult female acne. Although it's the antibiotics that kicked the breakouts, I feel like this toner freshens cleans and preps my skin for my skincare routine morning and night. I also have sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate. LOVE LOVE LOVE! Highly recommend if you want an aha/bha toner.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This product not only is phenomenal, but it smells & make your skin feel so vibrant‚Ä¶ I love it

reviews.headline: Refreshing toner
reviews.comments: I love rose water and this toner was amazing on my skin. I recommend if you're looking for a light and refreshing for sensitive skin. I have ros√°cea and it really helps my skin.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this product, he helps a lot with my breakouts and It's make my skin feel smooth, I will purchase this product again, and Im also using the other products too

reviews.headline: Supercharged my skincare routine
reviews.comments: Before i started using this product, i had a much more difficult time controlling oil and acne on my face. Once i started using this product, I began  to see more noticeable improvement in my acne. Any breakout sknce then has been less intense and leas frequent. Plus, the rosewater scent is so calming.

reviews.headline: Wonderful!
reviews.comments: I am in love with this stuff. It gets my skin so clean and has helped it brighten. I feel it's especially helpful for the oilier, breakout prone spots on my face, but not as helpful for the dry zones. So, if you have combo skin, be aware of that. Still, overall, it's a welcome addition to my skincare routine. It's stopped the prevalence of my breakouts in their tracks.

reviews.headline: Savior for rosacea!!
reviews.comments: I have rosacea and have tried many products to help it while also helping my acne, uneven texture, and dullness. Ive been using this about two weeks now and my rosacea flare-ups have reduced dramatically!! My skin is brighter and i feel more confident. I use it at night and in the morning, but in the morning i just wipe my face with it and then apply sunscreen, no facewashing or other products. Im very happy with my results.

reviews.headline: A definite 10/10
reviews.comments: If you have oily skin and/or large pores, I highly recommend this paired with a great serum and moisturizer. The texture if my skin has improved so much.

reviews.headline: Best product ever
reviews.comments: I sunburned while on vacation. Literally after using the toner and vitamin c serum for 1 week, my tone was back to normal. (No filter or makeup used)

reviews.headline: Buttah Skin Rosewater Toner
reviews.comments: I have fair, acne prone, sensitive, combination skin. I have an oily t-zone, with dry, eczema prone under eyes. This toner is great for oily skin, it is non greasy, does a great job of getting missed dirt, and has a very convenient pump, which is great for using with cotton pads. The only negative for me, is that I have dry skin patches also, so it did really nothing for that. Overall, great toner for oily skin.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: This stuff is incredible. I was looking for a more affordable product to replace my FAB Facial Radiance Pads, and this product has blown me away. My skin has never looked better. I even use it on areas that I shave or wax and it really helps with ingrown hairs. Highly recommend!! The only con is the packaging. I love that it's glass but the pump top isn't great for travel.

media.headline: First time trying and I love it

faceoff_positive.comments: Excellent product that lives up to it's reputation! After cleansing with the rose water, your face feels totally refreshed with a glow in appearance. I highly recommend this product to my senior sisters‚Ä¶it's worth every cent!
faceoff_positive.headline: üôåüèΩPERFECTION IN A BOTTLEüôåüèΩ

faceoff_negative.comments: I've had the Rosewater Toner for a few weeks, but I haven't really noticed a difference. I ran out of the supplied pads to apply the toner, but Buttah had them specifically made and didn't offer a link to purchase. I still don't understand why you would have something specially made to apply your product, then leave the customer to find something else? Does that not open the customer up to purchase something that may not work as well or offer the intended experience? I'll probably stick with the original set and not repurchase the Rosewater Toner.
faceoff_negative.headline: Let down
